seg.source: Basketball-Bundesliga: Klare Auftakterfolge für Berlin und Oldenburg
seg.translation: Basketball Bundesliga: Clear success for Berlin and Oldenburg
Basketball Bundesliga: comfortable opening wins for Berlin and Oldenburg
Basketball Bundesliga: Clear kick-off successes for Berlin and Oldenburg

seg.source: Berlin - ALBA Berlin ist mit einem deutlichen Sieg in die neue Saison der Basketball-Bundesliga gestartet.
seg.translation: Berlin - ALBA Berlin started the new German Basketball League season with a sound victory.
Berlin - ALBA Berlin started the new Basketball Bundesliga campaign with an impressive win.
Berlin - ALBA Berlin has started the new season of the basketball league with a clear victory.

seg.source: Gegen Science City Jena gewann der Vizemeister problemlos mit 112:55 (52:31) und bot über 40 Minuten eine überzeugende Partie.
seg.translation: Against Science City Jena, the runner-up won easily with 112-55 (52-31) over 40 minutes in a very exciting game.
Last year's runners-up cruised to victory against Science City Jena 112:55 (52:31) and played first-class basketball for 40 minutes.
Against Science City Jena, the runner-up easily won with 112: 55 (52: 31) and offered a convincing game over 40 minutes.

seg.source: Neuzugang Rokas Giedraitis war mit 20 Punkten Top-Scorer der dominierenden Berliner.
seg.translation: New addition Rokas Giedraitis was the top scorer of the dominating Berlin team with 20 points.
New arrival Rokas Giedraitis was the top scorer for the dominant Berliners with 20 points.
New signing Rokas Giedraitis was the top scorer for the dominant Berlin side with 20 points.

seg.source: Der aus Ludwigsburg verpflichtete Nationalspieler Johannes Thiemann (18 Zähler) zeigte vor 9113 Zuschauern bei seinem Pflichtspiel-Debüt ebenfalls eine ansprechende Leistung.
seg.translation: The international Johannes Thiemann from Ludwigsburg (18 points) also showed off his performance in front of 9113 spectators at his competitive debut.
National player Johannes Thiemann (18 points), signed from Ludwigsburg, also had an impressive competitive debut in front of a crowd of 9,113.
The international Johannes Thiemann (18 points), signed from Ludwigsburg, also showed an attractive performance in front of 9113 spectators on his mandatory debut.

seg.source: Ex-Meister Brose Bamberg siegte beim Pflichtspiel-Debüt von Trainer Ainars Bagatskis mit 84:80 (39:37) bei s.Oliver Würzburg.
seg.translation: Ex-champion Brose Bamberg won coach Ainars Bagatskis’ competitive debut with 84-80 (39-37) at s.Oliver Würzburg.
Ex-champions Brose Bamberg won their first competitive game under new coach Ainars Bagatskis 84:80 (39:37) at s.Oliver Würzburg.
Former champion Brose Bamberg won the mandatory match debut of coach Ainars Bagatskis with 84: 80 (39: 37) at s.Oliver Würzburg.

seg.source: Augustine Rubit war mit 24 Punkten bester Werfer bei den Gästen.
seg.translation: Augustine Rubit was the best scorer of the visitors with 24 points.
Augustine Rubit was the best player for the away team, with 24 points.
Augustine Rubit was the best pitcher among the guests with 24 points.

seg.source: Würzburg-Profi Gabriel Olaseni kam auf 14 Zähler.
seg.translation: Würzburg professional Gabriel Olaseni scored 14 points.
Würzburg player Gabriel Olaseni had 14 points.
Würzburg pro Gabriel Olaseni finished with 14 points.

seg.source: Der letztjährige Playoff-Halbfinalist MHP Riesen Ludwigsburg bezwang die Fraport Skyliners aus Frankfurt mit 83:76 (41:34).
seg.translation: Last year’s playoff semi-finalist MHP Riesen Ludwigsburg defeated the Fraport Skyliners from Frankfurt 83:76 (41:34).
Last year's playoff semi-finalists MHP Riesen Ludwigsburg defeated Frankfurt's Fraport Skyliners 83:76 (41:34).
Last year's playoff semi-finalist MHP Giants defeated the Frankfurt-based Fraport Skyliners 83-76 (41-34).

seg.source: Neu-Nationalspieler Karim Jallow war mit 24 Punkten treffsicherster Schütze beim Team von Trainer John Patrick.
seg.translation: New international Karim Jallow was the most accurate thrower with 24 points in coach John Patrick’s team .
New German national player Karim Jallow was the most prolific shooter for John Patrick's team, with 24 points.
New international Karim Jallow was the most accurate shooter on coach John Patrick's team with 24 points.

seg.source: Die EWE Baskets Oldenburg begannen die neue Spielzeit mit einem deutlichen Erfolg.
seg.translation: The EWE Baskets Oldenburg began the new season successfully.
EWE Baskets Oldenburg secured an important victory to start their new season.
The EWE Baskets Oldenburg started the new season with a clear success.

seg.source: Bei den Basketball Löwen Braunschweig gab es ein klares 100:64 (48:30) und die ersten beiden Punkte.
seg.translation: Basketball Löwen Braunschweig had a clear victory with 100:64 (48:30) and the first two points.
The Braunschweig Basketball Lions enjoyed a clear 100:64 (48:30) win for their first two points.
At the Basketball Lions Braunschweig there was a clear 100: 64 (48: 30) and the first two points.

seg.source: Der neue Spielmacher Will Cummings überragte bei den Oldenburgern mit 25 Zählern.
seg.translation: The new playmaker Will Cummings dominated the Oldenburg team with 25 points.
New playmaker Will Cummings shone for Oldenburg, scoring 25 points.
New playmaker Will Cummings was outstanding for the Oldenburg side with 25 points.

seg.source: Die Braunschweiger, bei denen NBA-Star Dennis Schröder seit Saisonbeginn Mehrheitseigner ist, enttäuschte nach einem guten ersten Viertel.
seg.translation: The Braunschweig team, in which NBA star Dennis Schröder has been the majority owner since the season started, disappointed after a good first quarter.
The Braunschweigers, whose new majority owner is NBA star Dennis Schröder, were disappointing after a good first quarter.
The Brunswick side, in which NBA star Dennis Schroeder has been the majority owner since the start of the season, disappointed after a good first quarter.

seg.source: Ein 26:1-Lauf der Baskets sorgte schnell für klare Verhältnisse.
seg.translation: A 26-1 run tells it all.
A 26:1 scoring run ensured a clear margin of victory.
A 26-1 run by the Baskets quickly made things clear.
